item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Xkcd 1425 (Tasks) turns ten years old today (207 points | 69 comments)
2. A new Llama-based model for efficient large-scale voice generation (12 points | 3 comments)
3. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (899 points | 683 comments)
4. Show HN: Cronexpr, a Rust library to parse and iter crontab expression (47 points | 6 comments)
5. Git-absorb: Git commit –fixup, but automatic (207 points | 94 comments)
6. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (566 points | 182 comments)
7. Rewriting Rust (169 points | 119 comments)
8. Galaxy Buds reportedly exploded in a user's ear causing permanent hearing loss (48 points | 26 comments)
9. Launch HN: Haystack (YC S24) – Visualize and edit code on an infinite canvas (253 points | 137 comments)
10. Eliminating Memory Safety Vulnerabilities at the Source (185 points | 87 comments)
11. The lost language extensions of MetaWare's High C compiler (2023) (254 points | 84 comments)
12. Show HN: Httpdbg – A tool to trace the HTTP requests sent by your Python code (146 points | 44 comments)
13. GitHub-events-viewer a.k.a. "What did I do yesterday?" (22 points | 3 comments)
14. Timeshare owner? The Mexican drug cartels want you (162 points | 174 comments)
15. How to avoid a BSOD on your 2B dollar spacecraft (125 points | 100 comments)
16. Moerenuma Park: A Giant, Gorgeous 'Living Sculpture' in Hokkaido (16 points | 3 comments)
17. Show HN: King Thirteen: 2048 with chess pieces, in under 13 KB (165 points | 52 comments)
18. Mira Murati leaves OpenAI (617 points | 425 comments)
19. Rearchitecting: Redis to SQLite (286 points | 101 comments)
20. Audio Masking (113 points | 16 comments)
21. Why I still blog after 15 years (386 points | 202 comments)
22. Optimizing Guile Scheme (151 points | 53 comments)
23. Shizuku: App that lets you use system APIs with higher privileges without root (10 points | discuss)
24. Clara (YC S24) Is Hiring a Head of Growth ( | hide)
25. Show HN: Fast and Exact Algorithm for Image Merging (95 points | 29 comments)
26. Show HN: Coros – A Modern C++ Library for Task Parallelism (90 points | 44 comments)
27. The Simple Magic of Consistent Hashing (2011) (23 points | 1 comment)
28. Just 5k people use the Rabbit R1 every day (5 points | 1 comment)
29. Capstone Disassembler Framework (75 points | 26 comments)
30. The Impact of Element Ordering on LM Agent Performance (36 points | 2 comments)
